tool_description: Validates the completeness, accuracy, and consistency of collected patient data across all registration and intake forms to ensure high-quality medical records.

check_duplicates.description: Whether to check for duplicate patient records

validate_formats.description: Whether to validate data format standards

cross_reference_check.description: Whether to cross-reference data across systems

error_messages: Invalid patient ID: Patient must exist in the system.
Invalid validation scope: Validation categories must be from approved data category list.
Invalid completeness threshold: Threshold must be between 0 and 100.
Validation failed: Unable to access required data for validation.
usage: Provide patient ID and specify validation scope to check data quality. Adjust thresholds and validation options based on requirements.

data_issues.description: List of data quality issues found
